# identifier

**Instance Property**

The string that identifies this content item.

## Declaration

```swift
var identifier: String { get }
```

## Discussion

The contents of this string are defined by you when you design your application.

## Inspecting an Identifier’s Contents

- **container**: The container that this content item is contained in.

items.description: The container that this content item is contained in.
items.name: container
